Timer Functions
[Real-Time Operation System]

Detailed Description

This module provides a fine timer in system clk ticks (1/49152000 sec), it includes high 32 bit and low 32 bit.

It uses dice2's 2nd hardware timer2 to record current time value. If _LEAVE_TIMER2 is defined this function will only be precise to 10ms but timer2 will be free to use by the application.


Functions

 Get timer2's value,.
